data.title: 30 Bollywood Trivia Quiz Questions and Answers – OnlineExamMaker Blog
data.text:
Bollywood is the informal term used for the Hindi-language film industry in India, based in Mumbai (formerly known as Bombay). It is one of the largest film industries in the world, producing over 1,000 films annually, and is known for its unique blend of music, dance, and drama. Bollywood films are characterized by their colorful and extravagant musical numbers, romantic storylines, and dramatic performances. The industry has a rich history that dates back to the early 20th century, and has produced many iconic films and stars over the years. Bollywood films have a massive global following, with fans drawn to the unique style and glamour of Indian cinema.

Do you consider yourself a fan of Bollywood? Can you sing along to the catchy tunes and recite your favorite dialogues by heart? If so, then put your knowledge to the test with our Bollywood quiz! With questions spanning a wide range of Bollywood eras, genres, and stars, our quiz is the perfect way for fans to show off their expertise and for newcomers to discover the many wonders of Bollywood. So, grab a bowl of popcorn, get comfortable, and let’s dive into the world of Bollywood together!

Article outline

Part 1: 30 Bollywood trivia quiz questions & answers

Part 2: Download Bollywood Trivia questions & answers for free

Part 1: 30 Bollywood trivia quiz questions & answers

Who is known as the “King of Bollywood”?

a) Shah Rukh Khan

b) Amitabh Bachchan

c) Salman Khan

d) Aamir Khan

Which actor made his debut with the film “Biwi Ho To Aisi” but rose to fame with the film “Maine Pyar Kiya”?

a) Salman Khan

b) Shah Rukh Khan

c) Aamir Khan

d) Sanjay Dutt

Who played the role of “Mogambo” in the movie “Mr. India”?

b) Om Puri

c) Paresh Rawal

d) Naseeruddin Shah
